api_list.name: Get File
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific file.

api_list.name: List Languages
api_list.description: Get the list of languages we support. The language codes included in the response will be required when placing orders via the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Order
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific order.

api_list.name: Get Revision
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific revision.

api_list.name: Create File
api_list.description: Creates a new file. File uploads are limited to 100Mb in size. Each file may be attached to only one resource after creation.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of file - source or reference

api_list.name: Download File
api_list.description: Retrieve a temporary download URL for the file. Files are encrypted and stored in an Amazon S3 bucket. When you want to download a file this request will generate a temporary signed URL allowing access to download the file securely. URLs expire after two minutes.

api_list.name: List Revisions
api_list.description: Get a paginated list of your revisions sorted in descending order by requested_at date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com/revisions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Orders
api_list.description: Get a paginated list of your orders sorted in descending order by received_at date.

        }

api_list.name: Create Order
api_list.description: Creates a new order. Files must be created prior as their IDs will be included in the files array of this request.

required_parameters.name: files
required_parameters.description: List of file IDs - type must be either source or reference

optional_parameters.name: notes
optional_parameters.description: Notes for staff or translators - basic HTML allowed

optional_parameters.name: services.shipping
optional_parameters.description: If you would like a hard copy shipped - only available with certified translation

optional_parameters.name: services.shipping_signature
optional_parameters.description: If an adult signature should be required for delivery

optional_parameters.name: services.shipping_service
optional_parameters.description: Level of shipping service - standard (USPS Priority Mail) or express (USPS Express Mail). Required if shipping.service is true

optional_parameters.name: services.expedited
optional_parameters.description: If you would like expedited turnaround service

optional_parameters.name: address.street_1
optional_parameters.description: First line of the address. Required if shipping.service is true

optional_parameters.name: address.city
optional_parameters.description: City the address is located in. Required if shipping.service is true

optional_parameters.name: address.recipient
optional_parameters.description: Name of the person - both name and company can be included. Required if shipping.service is true

optional_parameters.name: services.notarization
optional_parameters.description: If you would like the certification notarized - only available with certified translation

optional_parameters.name: address.state
optional_parameters.description: State or providence the address is located in. Required if shipping.service is true

optional_parameters.name: services.currency_conversion
optional_parameters.description: If you would like currency conversion - only available with certified translation

optional_parameters.name: address.zip
optional_parameters.description: Zip or postal code the address is located in. Required if shipping.service is true

optional_parameters.name: services.certification
optional_parameters.description: If you would like certified translation service otherwise standard translation provided

optional_parameters.name: address.country
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166 country code for the country the address is located in. Required if shipping.service is true

api_list.name: Create Revision
api_list.description: Creates a new revision for an order. Files (optional) must be created prior as their IDs will be included in the files array of this request. Only a file type of reference will be accepted.

required_parameters.name: order_number
required_parameters.description: Order number in need of revision
